responses.availability: I'm available every weekend and weekday evenings after 5pm.
responses.experience: I’ve worked in retail for over 2 years, handling inventory, restocking, and basic customer service. I also worked one summer in a warehouse environment.
responses.skills: Quick learner, team player, basic forklift certified, fluent in English and Spanish.
responses.location: I live in north Houston, but I can travel up to 25 miles if the shift starts after 5pm.
responses.other: I’m looking for extra work to support my family. I’m highly dependable and have never missed a scheduled shift.
